experiences.title: Software Developer II
experiences.subtitle: Towson University
workDescription: Worked with the Center for GIS team to design, build, and deploy mapping applications for state transportation and health agencies.
Web mapping with Leaflet and ArcGIS 4.3 Javascript API, front-end work with ReactJS and BackboneJS, and database work with ArcGIS and MS SQL Server. Back-end work with .NET.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: Hop N' Cru
workDescription: Built and maintained a web app for displaying and updating beer and wine store inventory and managing customer contacts.
Integrated google maps and business tools into a React Front end with PHP, MongoDB back end.
Iterative releases incorporating direct client and public feedback.
